website_summaries.verdict: Two-in-one lunch box offers two different sizes for one low price.
pros: Comes with a larger 10-by-6-inch lunch bag for bigger meals or picnics, and 5-by-5-inch lunch bag for everyday use
Sleek look with square, all-black design
cons: Handle could be sturdier and thicker

customer_reviews.title: Handle sewed on upside down
customer_reviews.text: Received this kit yesterday and was very disappointed to see that the handle was sewed on the bottom... don't really know what to say about that but I would hope that that does not happen often. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Mark S

customer_reviews.title: Great twin pack
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my lunch as I need 2 different lunch bags depending of what I take to work. Attached some pics to get a better perspective what can be store there. The small is handy and cute but not enough to store a bottle oh milk if you're having a nutritional check + a sandwich for lunch. I like both, price unmatchable, you get two pieces for the price of one, durable material. Very satisfied with purchase :)
customer_reviews.author: Happy Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality.
customer_reviews.text: These are great lunch bags!! They don't keep things as cold as I would like (even with 2-3 ice packs inside) but they allow me to carry lunch to school and work. They are very durable and stylish. Keep in mind that these are NOT CRISP AND SQUARE. They are a soft padded material. They keep a nice shape but they do sag. The size of each is perfect. They smaller one is nice for a lunch. If you plan on carrying more than a drink and a bento box, the big one is a great size. If you're looking for a nice, useful lunch bag, you can't go wrong with this set. It came quickly and is very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Grace

customer_reviews.title: Pink set is smaller than black set
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these, the pink set for myself and the black set for my husband. Even though they were the same price and listed the same dimensions (Large 6L x 6H x 10W inches, Small 5L x 5H x 7.5W inches), you can see in the photo that the pink set is much smaller than the black set. The large pink bag is just a little bigger than the small black bag. I don't want to say that this was intended to be sexist, but it was a disappointment. The pink set is also brighter pink than the soft pink pictured in the listing.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Miller Roby

customer_reviews.title: A Bit Thin Walled
customer_reviews.text: The sales picture of this lunch box makes it appear as though it has sturdy side walls. The reality is that the walls are rather thin and easily collapse inwards. The insulation is likewise rather thin, and not that good at keeping the food cold. This makes a reasonable lunch bag but you will likely need to keep the bag in a refrigerator if it sits for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Live Free

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent Product
customer_reviews.text: Inconsistent product. I purchased this lunchbox in the pink last year for my daughter and loved it! It fits a small thermos standing up, or a sandwich box along with other things without spillage. I’m giving three stars because the design is good. The small size is perfect for my kids lunches and they hold the containers perfectly. However, I just ordered 2 sets in the gray and the stitching is coming out of the handles and the actual lunchbox. The lunchbox itself is super cute and super functional I just wish it were made better. Brand new lunchboxes shouldn’t be falling apart. Definitely a bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Tauhney

customer_reviews.title: your standard of quality may differ
customer_reviews.text: This order seems to be less than what seller posted as the quality of the product. Reading the product description, one would get the feeling that this was a very well made product, however when it arrives & is inspected, then the "quality" of the item, starts to diminish fast. The product is standard rather than "higher quality" per the material & workmanship. The product is "flimsy" & very "thin". I havn't used this item as a "lunch box" nor do I think that one could pack a 6 pack can of beverages very well with the larger of the two piece product.
customer_reviews.author: DEEDUBB

customer_reviews.title: Fits comotomo bottles
customer_reviews.text: Bought these due to reading a comment that they would fit the 5 oz comotomo baby bottles and it’s true! The small fits 4 bottles snuggly. The large fits 5 bottles with room for an ice pack underneath since it’s slightly taller. The lids zip easily with bottles inside and there is not a significant distortion of the box shape. Bottles seem to stay upright with carry. I think the set looks even nicer in person than in pictures and seems well made. Cannot yet speak to watertightness or durability over time since just received. So far this set seems like a great deal!
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: Great Lunch Tote
customer_reviews.text: Nice color (black). Practical and durable. Easy to carry. The larger tote surprisingly holds a lot. Zipper works well...zips smoothly, no catching. Seems to be solidly constructed. Keeps food cold while in transit until I can refrigerate it at work. The smaller tote was a nice bonus although I haven't had the opportunity to use it yet. Good price. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Boba Connoisseur

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not very functional in real life
customer_reviews.text: These are cute bags but there's just not enough space for normal tupperware, even in the bigger one. It also only has the one handle, it would be nice if there was a longer strap to help carry. It's nice that they're insulated though, but I just can't fit much in them and I never use them anymore because of it. Maybe if you were only packing a few drinks or snacks it would work.
customer_reviews.author: Amador

customer_reviews.title: Going on three years of use and still going strong.
customer_reviews.text: I have had these bags for three years and they are exceeding expectations. For the price i figured it would last about a year if I was lucky and my wife ordered since I was just using plastic bags until they ripped. I have overloaded these, pulled the zipper assuming something would give and all around abuses these and they continue to hold up. For the price you cannot beat it.
customer_reviews.author: John Braun

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to purchase, thinking that the handle stitching would be cheaply done and weak. I'm glad that I bought them they're really nice and sturdy and certainly big enough, the handles are stitched on very well. Well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great lunch bags!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase, the customer service is excellent! I received an email from them 2 times making sure that I received my order. They seem very easy to work with. The lunch bags itself are great and I love having the option of two different sizes. I have been taking the smaller one with me to work and it has been working splendidly. I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Simple and effective
customer_reviews.text: We really like these no-frill lunchboxes. The two different sizes are great for different needs, but both are really quite roomy, and the smaller easily nests into the larger. With this simple design, there are no pockets or other compartments other than the main one. The insulation is great, they're easy to clean, and have a minimalist-friendly aesthetic. Our order also came with a free small drawstring backpack, which was a nice bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Avery

customer_reviews.title: Perfect birthday gift for Mom.
customer_reviews.text: In November I found myself stumbling around trying to find a birthday gift for me mother. On a whim I went with my go to choice.....Amazon. As I'm scrolling I happen to glance at the Hango insulated lunch box. As I got more details a few boxes started to get checked off. My mother likes to take milk and snacks to her bible study and church services. The smaller bag could fill that need. The larger lunch box could be used for long distance trips. My mother is very satisfied with my choice for her birthday gift. Thank You, Hango. And my go to, Amazon. E
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I've bought him lunch bags in the past and he never really liked them but he loves these
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband who would always take his lunch in a grocery bag. I've bought him lunch bags in the past and he never really liked them but he loves these. They have a nice style to him and they fit his large lunch perfectly. I pack his breakfast and snack in the smaller bag and his lunch in the bigger bag. I can fit 2 sodas, a water bottle, a yogurt, an applesauce, 4-5 different snacks, 2 plastic spoons, and a sandwich or small tupperware in it. So far it's held up and it is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Great for watehr or other small items that you carry in your car
customer_reviews.text: These two soft-coolers work very well to carry a few bottles of water on ice in my car during the stifling hot summers in Phoenix. I can leave my water or Propel drink in the car when I go to the store or an appointment and my liquid will stay very cold for an hour or more. while the temperature inside of my car gets as hot as 140 degrees Fahrenheit. These coolers are much less cumbersome than the normal, larger, plastic coolers and are perfect for small items.
customer_reviews.author: Maeonides

customer_reviews.title: So far these little lunch boxes are great for the price
customer_reviews.text: So far these little lunch boxes are great. The small one actually works fine for most of my lunches and I use the large one when I have Tupperware and a few other items. I also took the large one fishing and put a six pack of beer in there and it was perfect. I gave this set 4 out of 5 stars because there is a slight plastic smell mentioned in other reviews and I can see the material on the inside ripping if you constantly put things like 6 packs in them. However, these boxes are great for packing simple lunches and they look simple and sleek as well.
customer_reviews.author: Zach Attack

customer_reviews.title: Perfect match!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these about 1 year ago. I still use them! These are a perfect match for me! They are not too big or too small. They look classy and fit much more than what they look they would. I'm a classy, city working dude that still likes to save money making his own lunch, but without an awkward lunch bag that starts to stink a few weeks in, or tips over to one side, or that has all these awkward net looking bags around it. I also love having two different sizes. FIVE STAR!
customer_reviews.author: Jose Juan Rosas Velazquez

customer_reviews.title: Holding up well
customer_reviews.text: We use the larger one as an every day lunch box. It takes a couple of ice packs to keep everything cold in a truck all day, but the lunchbox itself is holding up to the abuse of being in a semi and tossed around all day long. A little more insulation wouldnt be bad, but for the price this is a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Netz

customer_reviews.title: Holds a lot and holds up after 5+ months of use
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my boyfriend for Christmas and 5 months later it is still going strong. I pack both bags to the brim most days and they are easy to clean. The small bag fits a 2-cup Pyrex container, a small jar (I use for orange juice), a banana, a piece of toast, and a fork perfectly. The large bag fits a 4 cup Pyrex container with extra space on the side for dressings, sauces, dips, etc. You can also fit a 2 cup Pyrex bowl sideways next to a 4-cup bowl. They're attractive and easy to clean. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for those who share small fridges in the workplace.
customer_reviews.text: My husband wanted to have a small lunch cooler to fit his daily meal prep container while not having a lot of extra space. The bag is durable and yes, stylish! I gave the larger bag to my son since he brings more food to his work. :)
customer_reviews.author: IrishGal

customer_reviews.title: Not a quality product
customer_reviews.text: I'm convinced the 5-star reviews on here are paid reviews. I read the reviews and bought this lunchbox set because of the reviews. My prior lunch box was purchased from Target and I spent $10. It has lasted me well. I got lazy when replacing it, and came on Amazon. This is a crap product, not at ALL worth the cost. I used it for the first time today. Even with the ice pack inside the bag, it did not keep my food cold for4-5 hours before I ate it. Inferior to my prior lunch box and very disappointed with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Denver Smith

customer_reviews.title: great quality, i just wish it was stated that ...
customer_reviews.text: the color is very cute, but I did have to return this product. my boyfriend has the black version of this and after finding out that my meal prep containers fit perfectly i ordered myself the pink ones. Sadly, the pink ones run an inch smaller all around. if you were to look at it from the bottom, you can see the difference. I specifically ordered this so i could fit my containers and since it would not fit, i had to return them. Overall, great quality, i just wish it was stated that it runs smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: It hasn't made my food or containers smell like plastic, and I haven't tried getting rid of ...
customer_reviews.text: Inside of lunch box smells slightly plastic-y, but it's no big deal. It's only if you open it, stick your head in, and take a whiff. It hasn't made my food or containers smell like plastic, and I haven't tried getting rid of the smell. Could just be a "new product" smell. Material is beautiful and quality. Definite upgrade from my ancient Arctic Zone box from literally like 10 years ago One I received was black, as Amazon picture currently shows. (I saw some reviews were calling theirs pink.) Glad I got black :)
customer_reviews.author: eonate

customer_reviews.title: Two durable lunchboxes
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a simple and functional lunchbox and this is perfect! I love that it comes in a set of two - it works out great when my partner and I both take lunches. The small size lunchbox still fits the largest size container that I pack my lunch in, which is very impressive. Both sizes fit in my backpack that I take to work and aren't too bulky. This product seems very durable and I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: haley.kTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Two bags, One Lunch
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I imagined. The bigger one functions fine for my daily lunch bag, although sometimes a bit tight. I'm not sure when I'll ever use the small one. I guess maybe during the summer to carry around a couple cans of drinks. For the price though, not bad, pretty good quality and we'll see if it last longer than the last one I bought (different brand.)
customer_reviews.author: Some Art Guy

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, bad smell.
customer_reviews.text: These lunch boxes are perfect size and very fashionable. I have gotten many compliments on the look of them. However, after first opening from the packaging they had this awful smell. The smell has since faded to where you cannot smell it unless you actually sniff the lunch bag.
customer_reviews.author: Darby

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t be happier!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this set specifically so that my husband could use the small one for his lunch box... he is very pleased! The larger one is a nice bonus for us (considering we didn’t need it) but we’ll be using it on roadtrips and for potlucks!
customer_reviews.author: Fleming Family

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: My husband has a tiny little locker at work and we needed something that could fit inside while also holding his whole lunch. The smaller bag works perfectly and there's even room for some small ice packs! Both of the bags seem well made and sturdy. They came with a drawstring bag to carry them in which I'm sure I can find other uses for. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality and very good looking
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality and very good looking. Purchased this for my boyfriend because I only had girly lunch bags (which he refused to take to work and school, therefore spent a lot of money buying food lol). I love that it came with two, so now I use the smaller one which is still a good enough size to carry my complete lunch and snacks. I recommend purchasing these!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley V.

customer_reviews.title: Cool little lunch coolers
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price. The larger one holds my lunch casserole dish and a small snack container. The little one I haven’t used yet but will be handy for a sandwich and snack. Wish they had a shoulder strap.
customer_reviews.author: Sarahb

customer_reviews.title: I've been searching for a nice and simple
customer_reviews.text: I've been searching for a nice and simple, and also look appropriate for professional/office environment type of product. I also wanted the holder/strap be at the top so it can be carried properly and prevent food spill/leaking. This product gives me all of that and also comes in 2 sizes that can fit multiple items inside. The package looks very professional and is in good quality. It's been 2 weeks since I received these and they are still in good condition. Very happy with the purchase so far.
customer_reviews.author: KV

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: I use the bigger one for my lunches and the smaller one for breakfast while I attend nursing school. They are sturdy, very easy to clean, Carry, & store. I would absolute buy these in the future as gifts for those who would need something like this.
customer_reviews.author: Britnee

customer_reviews.title: Loved however they are not gray they are an olive ...
customer_reviews.text: Loved however they are not gray they are an olive green. Returned for the black. Perfect for the price
customer_reviews.author: Lilly

customer_reviews.title: Such a deal!
customer_reviews.text: What an awesome combination at a great price this turned out to be! The material has withstood all the fridge abuse to be among many other bags at work. Some spilied milk got on the bag and it cleaned perfectly. Another person ordered the same...after they saw mine. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: ulation

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size & Looks Great
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using the larger of the two lunch boxes for a little over a week now and i’m impressed with it so far. I gave the smaller one to a friend of mine and she seems happy with hers as well. I don’t care for large bulky lunch boxes and this one has the perfect amount of storage capacity for me. I also like the look of the lunch boxes. I chose black as the color and these lunch boxes are simple but sharp in appearance. I also like how easy the lunch box is to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas H.

customer_reviews.title: Great price for great bags.
customer_reviews.text: Very nicely made bags that keep very cold. The pack came with 2 which is amazing so now we can both use one. I washed them when I got them in warm water, just the inside and let them air dry overnight and they were ready to rock by the next day. Took one to the park with a cold pack and my food and drink were still cold by the time I had lunch. I would highly recommend these
customer_reviews.author: John Turner

customer_reviews.title: Great Lunchboxes!
customer_reviews.text: This lunchbox is a great size and fits almost any size Tupperware. I really like how it came with two because I don’t always need the large one. The only small issue is that there was string hanging from the bottom which I assume is maybe from poor manufacturing. This isn’t an issue for me but I can see how others might be bothered by this.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Great bags!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the design and size of the bags! Note, it is a little thinner that I thought it would be...but for the price it is good!
customer_reviews.author: Angelina Diana

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality Lunch Tote
customer_reviews.text: This bag is a great, insulated lunch bag. Keeps my stuff cold and has a sturdy handle on top. Zipper is strong. I didn't realize the bag was going to be basically neon pink, but it is. I thought it was going to be more of a muted red/orange. But, everything about the quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: Matty Bo

customer_reviews.title: which was really nice. The bags are in excellent condition
customer_reviews.text: The lunch boxes came in a day earlier than anticipated, which was really nice. The bags are in excellent condition. They come in in this white,fancy cloth bag. The material feels strong and they look really nice too. The smaller one is more for like bento boxes. In the larger one I throw in sodas, sandwiches, fruit and salad containers. Would recommend. Also, someone from the company e-mails you to make sure your lunch boxes have arrived and to make sure you are satisfied with them. I would say that is above and beyond costumer service.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The smaller one is the perfect size for my husband to use for work. Everything fits without crowding his lunch. It keeps everything cool and fresh I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara R

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect much from these bags but when they arrived, I must say that I instantly liked them. They're well made with adequate storage. Definitely worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Akeva Fraser

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Overall I expected it to be larger. Also, the smaller bag is VERY small. When zipping it up for the first time the zipper kept getting stuck and I was afraid I was going to break it. Not sure how long it will last. Probably will get something more durable for my boyfriend and I to use for work. However, I do really like the color and the look of it is cute. I just wish it was a little bigger and more durable.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Very small
customer_reviews.text: Make sure to measure as they are pretty small. I bought them and then returned them because the could not do the job of holding my big man lunch.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia - DC

customer_reviews.title: "Dude Friendly" lunchbox
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the price. I like having the two size options. I was immediately complimented on the no-nonsense "masculine aesthetic" of the lunch box the first time I took it to work. I also use it to throw a few beers in if I'm heading to the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew N.

customer_reviews.title: Great price and you get TWO bags!
customer_reviews.text: The fact that you get two bags for the price of one made this a great value for us. I use the larger bag for my lunch while my wife uses the smaller bag for the baby. This set of two seems good quality and better priced than most of the competitors. For a small square bag, I am not sure while some companies this they can charge so much. Most of them are of the same quality as this. I would go back to using plastic bags before going with an expensive lunch bag.
customer_reviews.author: Reviews All Day Long

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as I hoped
customer_reviews.text: One of the selling points for me was the carry bag it came with. I was quite disappointed to find it too small to hold the large lunch bag without considerable squishing and too short to accommodate both. The lunch containers themselves seen sturdy enough. But do really counted on carrying them as one unit.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Wright

customer_reviews.title: Great find for my work lunches
customer_reviews.text: I really like this for my work lunches. The two sizes are great because the small one is good for work and the big one will be great for summer picnics or for going down the shore. There is no inside compartment but because there's enough space, it's still a great lunch bag for work. I can fit my ziploc containers, a yogurt, and a couple snacks in there. A great find! It aso feels very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Kolesnik

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: This is what I have found! Reasonable price and good quality! And the manufacture company ‘Hango’ sent me 20% discounts coupon. If it get old, I would like to buy again with this. But if you add an option for mix and match like black large one and red small, it would be wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nursing student on the go
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived on time. I was definitely pleased with the packaging! I loved the bag that the lunch bags came in and I will repurpose that bag. The lunch bags itself were exactly as how I expected. The zipper worked great and I'm excited to start packing my lunch to school this week.
customer_reviews.author: Jah

customer_reviews.title: Seems like it could be insulated a lot better
customer_reviews.text: Seems like it could be insulated a lot better... One sandwich with two slim cooler packs, and my sandwich was soggy after 5 hours. Four packs seems to work better, but I had higher expectations for this. I'm not sure using all four cooler packs would keep a drink cold enough. Good thing we have a water cooler at work.
customer_reviews.author: George Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Nice lunch boxes for a good value
customer_reviews.text: Nice lunch boxes for a good value. My food stays insulated all day with a very slim ice pack, and I like the fact that you get two in one here, great sizes and works perfectly for a small lunch or snacks, I have even fit both with the ice pack inside (smaller size). And with the larger ones you can fit more than two meals inside! I even purchased my boyfriend these in black. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: valerie mika

customer_reviews.title: I really like them at first
customer_reviews.text: I really like them at first, the zippers are good and easy to open, everything looks nice. However, after only a few times using them, putting regular lunch boxes in it, the inside layer was punctured already. It's so thin and not well-made. We have another lunch bag from REI and after so many years of using it, it looks dirty but never has holes and torn apart. So, I would not recommend this product to anyone. It's sad.
customer_reviews.author: Paw Siriluk

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality and size
customer_reviews.text: Perfect lunch bag size,also holds plastic sandwich containers easily,plus can put fruit and a bag of chips or such in the large one. The smaller one will be good for a smaller version of foods but would not hold a plastic sandwich container,perfect for fruit and nuts or small pop cans. Nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: B. schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Best lunchbox
customer_reviews.text: Love these lunchboxes! My fiancé has the big one & I have the smaller one. However, I am able to fit containers & other food items & plastic wear into the small one & everything fits! We have had these for about a year now, & zippers are still in tact. Would recommend to others. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: hello

customer_reviews.title: Great seller, wonderful experience, perfect lunch bag for teens!
customer_reviews.text: Seller was highly responsive to my inquiries. Lunch bag is nice, draw string storage pouch is really nice too! My teen loves it. Fast shipping too!
customer_reviews.author: C Hargraves

customer_reviews.title: Use it everyday
customer_reviews.text: Started back to work over the summer and I needed a lunchbox. This lunchbox has been doing a great job. I use the small one, but it still fits everything I need and more. It keeps my food cold but not frozen.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly D

customer_reviews.title: What I love so much about this lunch box is not just ...
customer_reviews.text: What I love so much about this lunch box is not just the size of the lunch box but the shape of it. Everything sits flat and it zippers up top. I will work 10-12 hour days throughout the week and I can store multiple meals and snacks in this lunch box. I have several lunch bags and boxes and this is by far my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Simone Keane

customer_reviews.title: Bad smell
customer_reviews.text: Was so excited when these came in, however, they had a bad smell to them. So I let them air out for a day or so. I’ve now have had these for a few months and the smell is still there or is worse. I stopped using them and will be tossing them because of that smell.
customer_reviews.author: Heyyjaylee

customer_reviews.title: perfect match
customer_reviews.text: love the way they look and the size its just perfect, you can use them for small or big meals and makes them keep its temperature for a reasonable amount of time
customer_reviews.author: clau

customer_reviews.title: Seam ripping after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with these at first. I used the larger one for my son's daycare items (3 sippy cups, lunch, and two snacks all fit) and the smaller one for my lunch. Unfortunately the seam on the larger one is coming apart already and won't let much longer. Also note the handles are quite short, though this is common with lunch boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Zippers are hard to work
customer_reviews.text: I don't like how hard it is to work the zippers to open and close the bags . I am very worried they are just going to get stuck
customer_reviews.author: Chip63

customer_reviews.title: Not leak proof
customer_reviews.text: I ride a motorcycle to work so I needed a lunch pale that would fit in my backpack, the size is perfect, my only complaint is that it is NOT 100% leak proof like they advertised. I had ice in it which melted as usual and the water started seeping out of the bottom and soaked my backpack. So I recommend using frozen packs and not ice if you don’t want things getting wet
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with the quality
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my second grader to take to school everyday. We use the larger size while my preschooler sometimes takes the smaller one to feel grown up! I am very pleased with the quality. We use the Easy Lunchboxes. I knew it'd be a tight fit when I ordered this lunch box. And it is, but having the double zipper helps. I am able to pack an Easy Lunchbox, an ice pack, and a thermos. I like that the Easy Lunchbox stays upright in this bag, and that the size is not overwhelming for my second grader. I will order another one next year for my kindergartner.
customer_reviews.author: Ksmama

customer_reviews.title: A little cheap for price
customer_reviews.text: Pretty flimsy especially for the price. I was disappointed. I could have bought a well made set at Walmart for less.
customer_reviews.author: Adelle ❤️

customer_reviews.title: I like these and they look nice
customer_reviews.text: Overal, I like these and they look nice. The smaller one doesn't fit much, but I use it for breakfast and the larger one for lunch. It isn't the best at keeping everything cold, but it doesn't do horrible. I would recommend overall, but it's not the best lunch box ever.
customer_reviews.author: Carly

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I love these little lunch boxes by Hango. My husband and I use them to bring our lunches to work. They fit way more than you would expect and they are sleek and well-designed. Plus, it's such a perk that you get two! We haven't experimented yet with how long things stay cold when not in the fridge, but I bet they do the trick!
customer_reviews.author: Haley Bakker

customer_reviews.title: It's to small
customer_reviews.text: Okay the lunch box is soooo small I cant fit what I want in it so I will not buy again
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Water seeps through material.
customer_reviews.text: Once the ice melts, the water goes right through the material! Not sure if mine was defective or if this is how they come. I put in my suite case. Once the ice melted it got most of my Clothes wet!
customer_reviews.author: Estefania Silva

customer_reviews.title: Defective - Good Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Recived a defective bag with the handel on the bottom side as you can see in the picture. Furthermore they two were that same size. Fortunately Attican has great customer service and I recived a "proper" set within a couple days of contacting Attican. Other that reciving a deffective and inncorect set, the lunch bags are great. I've been using them everyday for the past couple of weeks and they're great for their price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: Love our his and hers lunch bags!! perfect size, professional looking and good quality! good price too
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Looked great, albeit a bit small
customer_reviews.text: Opened the bag. Looked great, albeit a bit small, but the looks made up for that. But once I opened both the bags , there was an extreme smell similar to gasoline. It was almost as if the bags were off-gasing... and reminded me of the smell that come from VERY cheap plastic toys. Has there any study been done on the material and whether it is fit for storage of food stuff at all...
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: Does not keep things cold
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed. I used these for the first time today and found that even with a blue ice nothing including the frozen blue ice does not stay cold.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Good little soft coolers
customer_reviews.text: I use the small one everyday - take it to work for pumping. I can fit two Tommee Tippee bottles plus one Medela bottle, or four Medela bottles (all with flat caps, no nipples). Has held up for a few months of daily use! Haven't used the big one regularly, just here and there. Overall very happy with these.
customer_reviews.author: EnTK

customer_reviews.title: More room than they appear
customer_reviews.text: Top quality construction and materials. Much more space than they appear to have. My big salad container fit just fine in the larger bag. It doesn't take up as much space in the break room refrigerator as my old bag( a big deal where I work). Shipped on time and packed very well. I got emails from the company for order received and shipped. Personal and polite, not the standard auto-reply. I have not seen that before. Nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Coyote

customer_reviews.title: Cheap.
customer_reviews.text: Horrible quality and not what I expected at all. They are nice looking from far away, but incredibly cheap quality. They're worth maybe $10 combined but not over $20. No way.
customer_reviews.author: Tara m.

customer_reviews.title: Large great adult lunch box
customer_reviews.text: My husband and i use these and the large one is great for adult lunches. Can fit several tupperware containers of varying size. I do wish there were more compartments, but the one large compartment works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and convenient. Love the color and material. Really great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Eingely JS

customer_reviews.title: Awesome but smells.
customer_reviews.text: Really love the two lunch bag, perfect for school and work. They're durable and stylish, but keep in mind the structure is pretty soft so they won't keep their shape for very long. The only reason why I deducted one star is that it came weird odor that wouldn't go away...
customer_reviews.author: Han

customer_reviews.title: Great price for 2 bags
customer_reviews.text: Great price for 2 bags, and I love the neutral design and quality of the bags. The smaller bag has enough room to pack 1 meal and some snack items like fruits and veggies. Fiance uses the larger bag and can even fit his 24 oz water bottle in it. You will need to use ice packs if you want food to stay cold, but that's not a problem for me because I just put it in the fridge right away. I would definitely buy another.
customer_reviews.author: ASH

customer_reviews.title: I like that the order comes with 2 sizes
customer_reviews.text: I decided it was time for a new lunch bag, and stumbled upon these. I like that the order comes with 2 sizes, as some days I work much longer than others. The larger bad fits my water bottle too! Shipping was fast. Quality is nice. Definitely pleased with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Lyndsey Piekarz

customer_reviews.title: Good for adults
customer_reviews.text: It looks good for an adult lunch bag and it's nice that it comes in two sizes. What I don't like about it is that it doesn't insulate at all but for the price that's acceptable. I wasn't a fan of the white cloth bag they came in. It was filthy.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and durable!
customer_reviews.text: Using it to hold phone chargers and things we need to take in the car everyday! Perfect size!
customer_reviews.author: Buttons

customer_reviews.title: Back-up Lunch Tote
customer_reviews.text: Well insulated and easily carried. Used the bigger one which fit one small 3 compartment lunch dish, a very small square cup and small bottle of water. The smaller one is practically useless as it really only fits ONE can of soda and nothing else.
customer_reviews.author: JulieR

customer_reviews.title: Perfect design for work
customer_reviews.text: Perfect design for work. I love both the colors and design. 2 bags with great size as well. Not heavy duty, but pretty durable. Awesome product at good price.
customer_reviews.author: Colddream1508

customer_reviews.title: Quality is awesome !!
customer_reviews.text: I loveeee the quality of these bags!! Super nice storage! I use one for breast milk storage while traveling! & the smaller bag i love for my skin care products ;) I feel so happy & organized! Only thing is I tried to order more but coupon code that was sent with package does not work:(
customer_reviews.author: ayonna

customer_reviews.title: Nice and simple
customer_reviews.text: Love the simple design. It’s minimalistic look is great and holds my lunch just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Theyya Tanaleon

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: tall enought to fit drinks, having to sizes helps with snack pack.
customer_reviews.author: Penelope F.

customer_reviews.title: Get this!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE! It's great to have 2 just in case you'd like to leave one at work overnight. They're easy to clean and the large one carries a lot. On some days I'm at work for all three meals and can pack them in here.
customer_reviews.author: NewDogOwner

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, useful sizes.
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice quality. The stitching and zippers are solid, and the two sizes are really convenient. I use them primarily to transport bottles of milk to daycare. Sometimes, the bottles leak, and when I'm done crying over the spilled milk, I just rinse the bags and let them air dry, and they're ready to use again the next morning.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Lunching in Style
customer_reviews.text: Love the bags, their presentation and the company's commitment to customer service. I am using these for my son's school lunch. The zippers seem sturdy, the lining is easy to clean -- these and the fact that they are attractive in a minimalist way makes me happy I made the choice to purchase them.
customer_reviews.author: darling

customer_reviews.title: Looks and durability
customer_reviews.text: I like this product, I take it to chemotherapy with me, to keep my drinks cold. Used today and did great
customer_reviews.author: George Haynes

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are not really any better than the more affordable lunch bags I’ve bought from other vendors.
customer_reviews.author: Parker

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: They’re very nice! The structure is soft so the shape doesn’t stay square so just be aware, if that is a preference. But I am pleased and glad I purchased them!!
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Great Lunchbags
customer_reviews.text: We have received our black lunch bags and have used them for 2 days now. We were impressed with the craftsmanship, the packaging with the white fabric bag - keep doing that, and personal touch with the coupon! They are perfect! We also like your logo, and logo on the bag, it fits our minimalist lifestyle and feels clean and sleek. The small bag fits my apple, oranges, banana, vitamins, protein bar, and room for extra perfectly. From the fridge to the bag, my apple stayed cool about 6 hours on my desk. We appreciated the value for the price! $20 was a great deal for two!
customer_reviews.author: Lukas

customer_reviews.title: GF Loves it!
customer_reviews.text: GF loves her lunch boxes! It starts with a strong plastic smell, may need to let it air out for a couple days, but quality material, not falling apart and still looks brand new. Very pleased as is she.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Good for the price. They keep food cold. But they are kind of flimsy. Though the handle was going to be leather, but it was a really thin fabric. So hopefully it will last. Overall they do the job and they are a perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed with this product
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this product! It is not as sturdy as it looks in the picture. It came flat in one of those plastic bubble envelopes. The zipper gets stuck and is very hard to zip and unzip. It is not worth the money and I would return this but they are going to charge you shipping. I do not recommend this product at all. Go to Walmart or any sporting goods store and you will find a much better quality at cheaper price.
customer_reviews.author: tkrimscat

product_meta.title: HANGO Insulated Lunch Bag [Set of 2 Sizes] - For Women & Men - Easy to Clean, Keeps Food Cold or Warm - Large & Small Sizes, Perfect for Everyday Uses
feature_bullets: KEEPS YOUR MEAL FRESH and naturally tasty anywhere you go. Made with an excellent foam insulation system that keeps your foods and beverages stored at stable temperature making these bags ideal for you to bring your lunch to school or work.

TWO BAGS FOR A COST OF ONE. Feature a unique set of large and small bags that measure 6x6x10 inches and a 5x5x7.5 inches ideal for different moments. These lunch bags are also suitable for bringing foods and beverages to picnics, road trips, fishing, beach days or camping.
CONVENIENT AND STYLISH TO CARRY. Look good with these cute lunch boxes everywhere you go. Portable and lightweight, making these lunch tote bags practical and easy to carry around with style.

DURABLE AND WELL FINISHED. Made of high-density 300D polyester canvas and stainless steel zipper, ensuring you won’t have to worry about durability. These reusable bags are well-built to endure all the wear and pressure of daily use for a long time.

PROMOTES HEALTHIER EATING. Say goodbye to expensive fast foods and start bringing your homemade meals with these environment-friendly lunch bags. A great gift for your friends and loved ones. Order yours today!
